abstract: As more buildings fall in a strong earthquake in Turkey, a fresh call for a safer, but cheap, design.
snippet: As more buildings fall in a strong earthquake in Turkey, a fresh call for a safer, but cheap, design.
lead_paragraph: Oct. 24, 5:32 a.m. | Updated The latest earthquake in Turkey -- that country's strongest in a decade -- provides a fresh reminder of the deep vulnerability created by weak building designs in the world's crowded seismic danger zones. There will be more horror to come there and in other places prone to powerful quakes.

headline.main: Designing for Safety in Turkey and Other Earthquake Zones
